Module SC2002
Package sc2002

Class Student

java.lang.Object
sc2002.User
sc2002.Student
Direct Known Subclasses:
CCM
public class Student extends User
Represents a Student who is a type of User with additional functionalities. Extends the User class.
Since:
25/11/2023
Author:
Kiersten Yeo

    • EditMyEnquiry

      public void EditMyEnquiry(int index, String newEnquiry)
      Edits an enquiry in the list of enquiries the student submitted
      Parameters:
      index - (of type int) Index of the enquiry the student wants to edit
      newEnquiry - (of type String) New enquiry the student wants to edit the old enquiry to

    • FindEnquiry

      public Enquiries FindEnquiry(int enquiryID)
      Finds an enquiry in the list of enquiries the student submitted
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - index(of type int) Index of the enquiry the student wants to find
      Returns:
      Enquiry the student wants to find (if not found, return error message)

    • dateClash

      public boolean dateClash(String date)
      Checks if the date of a camp the student wants to register for clashes with any registered camps
      Parameters:
      date - date to check if there is a clash
      Returns:
      true if there is a date clash, false if there are no date clashes
